mapper.select: SELECT * FROM companies WHERE deleted is NULL;
SELECT * FROM companies WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted is NULL;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO companies (prefecture_id, name, representative, phone_number, postal_code, address, mail_address, created, modified) VALUES (#{prefectureId}, #{name}, #{representative}, #{phoneNumber}, #{postalCode}, #{address}, #{mailAddress}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.delete: UPDATE companies SET deleted = NOW() WHERE id = #{id};
